price: (116) They said, "If you do not desist, O Noah, you will surely be of those who are stoned."
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰنُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمَرۡجُومِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yānūḥu latakūnanna mina al-marjūmīna
